syntax.param: can be one of the following: 0 / "AUTO" - control position (x,y,w,h) is always rounded to whole pixels (game default) 1 / "ON" - control position (x,y,w,h) is rounded to whole pixels only when not animating 2 / "OFF" - control position (x,y,w,h) is always precise, no pixel rounding applies here0"AUTO"1"ON"2"OFF"
